entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this morning. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
